hotel_name: Hyatt Studios Jacksonville / St Johns Town Center
description: Discover Southern hospitality at Hyatt Studios Jacksonville / St Johns Town Center, offering inviting studio apartment-style suites in Deerwood. Enjoy comforts like a fully equipped kitchen, free breakfast, free parking and a patio outfitted with a firepit and grilling station to help you settle into a longer stay. Prime shopping and attractions—including Topgolf Jacksonville, EverBank Stadium, University of North Florida, museums and beautiful beaches—are within a short drive of our central location.

description: Explore Montana’s natural wonders from Hyatt Studios Kalispell, your gateway to Glacier National Park and beyond. Our apartment-style suites feature full kitchens and living spaces that feel like home, perfect for short- or long-term stays. Enjoy Free Grab ‘n’ Go Breakfast, complimentary Wi-Fi and parking, and our 24-hour Fitness Studio — plus an outdoor patio with grills and a firepit. A short distance from the hotel, you’ll find restaurants, shopping centers and top-notch golf courses. Plus, visit nearby attractions like Lone Pine State Park or the Northwest Montana History Museum. Make Hyatt Studios Kalispell home base for your Montana adventure.

pet_policy_description:
Dogs Are Welcome
At Park Hyatt Melbourne, we also extend our signature hospitality to guests on four legs. Our dog-friendly offering invites your canine companion to enjoy the same level of comfort and care as you. From serene garden strolls to sunlit naps to in-room indulgence, every detail is designed with your pooch in mind. Each dog enjoys a plush bed, food and water bowls, a welcome treat and exclusive access to our in-room dining menu for Very Important Pooches. You may even spot Charlie, our resident pup and unofficial ambassador, always ready with a wag and a warm “hello.” View our Hotel Policies page for more information.

amenities_json: ['Business Services', 'Digital Check-In', 'Digital Key', 'Electric Vehicle Charging', 'Fitness Center', 'Free Internet Access', 'Free Parking', 'Meeting Facilities', 'Self-Parking', 'Dog Friendly', 'Pool', 'Restaurant On-Site']
pet_policy_description:
Pets Are Welcome
Hyatt Place East End is a dog-friendly hotel, so feel free to bring your canine friend along on your next visit! To ensure maximum comfort for all of our guests, following the departure of a guest and their pet, there are certain steps we must take to ensure the suite is clean and free from possible allergens. We deep clean carpets, drapes, bedspreads and other linens, and fumigate the suite. For this reason, we add the nonrefundable pet/cleaning fee to the account during check-in. GUIDELINES FOR DOG OWNERS: All dogs must be housebroken. Dogs must be on leashes when in public areas. Pets are not allowed in the food service areas and pool areas. Your pet must be confined in a carrier if left unattended during the cleaning of your room or you can arrange a time for our staff to clean the room at a time when you can remove your animal. Please note, guests may be asked to leave if repeated instances/complaints of barking. Please call our hotel at (631) 208 0002 prior to your arrival to let us know you’ll be bringing your dog(s)
Pet Fees
1–6 nights: $100 / 1 STAY
7-30 nights + additional cleaning fee: $200 / 1 STAY
Weight Limits
Individual pet weight limit:  50 Pounds
Combined pets weight limit: 75 Pounds
Maximum number of pets is 2.
